name: extend
title: extend.ai
shortDescription: Extend leverages large language models (LLMs) to transform document processing. It's designed for technical teams facing complex document challenges. Users can quickly convert documents into high-quality data with over 95% accuracy, bypassing traditional OCR limitations. Ideal for handling intricate documents like tables and handwritten notes, Extend is a game-changer for industries reliant on accurate document digitization.
cons: May require initial setup and training
Potentially high cost for premium features
Focused primarily on complex documents, not simple ones

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ABBYY FlexiCapture
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers advanced OCR and form processing
